verses.verse: וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> Then I looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold אֶל־ <WH413> in הָרָקִ֙יעַ֙ <WH7549> and behold in the firmament אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> that was עַל־ <WH5921> over רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> that was above the head הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <WH3742> of the cherubims כְּאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone סַפִּ֔יר <WH5601> over them as it were a sapphire כְּמַרְאֵ֖ה <WH4758> as the appearance דְּמ֣וּת <WH1823> of the likeness כִּסֵּ֑א <WH3678> of a throne נִרְאָ֖ה <WH7200> there appeared עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> above

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> And he spake אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> unto the man לְבֻ֣שׁ <WH3847> clothed הַבַּדִּ֗ים <WH906> with linen וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> and said בֹּא֩ <WH935> Go in אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּינ֨וֹת <WH996> between לַגַּלְגַּ֜ל <WH1534> the wheels אֶל־ <WH413> about תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under לַכְּר֗וּב <WH3742> [even] under the cherub וּמַלֵּ֨א <WH4390> and fill חָפְנֶ֤יךָ <WH2651> thine hand גַֽחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> with coals אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> of fire מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <WH996> from between לַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <WH3742> the cherubims וּזְרֹ֖ק <WH2236> and scatter עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> [them] over the city וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> And he went in לְעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> in my sight

וְהַכְּרֻבִ֗ים <WH3742> Now the cherubims עֹֽמְדִ֛ים <WH5975> stood מִימִ֥ין <WH3225> on the right side לַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house בְּבֹא֣וֹ <WH935> went in הָאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> when the man וְהֶעָנָ֣ן <WH6051> and the cloud מָלֵ֔א <WH4390> filled אֶת־ <WH853> הֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> court הַפְּנִימִֽית׃ <WH6442> the inner

וַיָּ֤רָם <WH7311> went up כְּבוֹד־ <WH3519> Then the glory יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from הַכְּר֔וּב <WH3742> from the cherub עַ֖ל <WH5921> unto מִפְתַּ֣ן <WH4670> [and stood] over the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> of the house וַיִּמָּלֵ֤א <WH4390> was filled הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> and the house אֶת־ <WH854> with הֶ֣עָנָ֔ן <WH6051> with the cloud וְהֶֽחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> and the court מָֽלְאָ֔ה <WH4390> was full אֶת־ <WH854> with נֹ֖גַהּ <WH5051> of the brightness כְּב֥וֹד <WH3519> glory יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

וְקוֹל֙ <WH6963> And the sound כַּנְפֵ֣י <WH3671> wings הַכְּרוּבִ֔ים <WH3742> of the cherubims' נִשְׁמַ֕ע <WH8085> was heard עַד־ <WH5704> far הֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> court הַחִיצֹנָ֑ה <WH2435> [even] to the outer כְּק֥וֹל <WH6963> as the voice אֵל־ <WH410> God שַׁדַּ֖י <WH7706> of the Almighty בְּדַבְּרֽוֹ׃ <WH1696> when he speaketh

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בְּצַוֹּתוֹ֙ <WH6680> And it came to pass [that] when he had commanded אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> the man לְבֻֽשׁ־ <WH3847> clothed הַבַּדִּים֙ <WH906> with linen לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying קַ֥ח <WH3947> Take אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> fire מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <WH996> between לַגַּלְגַּ֔ל <WH1534> from between the wheels מִבֵּינ֖וֹת <WH996> between לַכְּרוּבִ֑ים <WH3742> from between the cherubims וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> then he went in וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֔ד <WH5975> and stood אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> beside הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <WH212> the wheels

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> stretched forth הַכְּר֨וּב <WH3742> And [one] cherub אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֜וֹ <WH3027> his hand מִבֵּינ֣וֹת <WH996> between לַכְּרוּבִ֗ים <WH3742> from between the cherubims אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> unto the fire אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which בֵּינ֣וֹת <WH996> was between הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <WH3742> that [was] between the cherubims וַיִּשָּׂא֙ <WH5375> and took וַיִּתֵּ֔ן <WH5414> [thereof] and put אֶל־ <WH413> to חָפְנֵ֖י <WH2651> [it] into the hands לְבֻ֣שׁ <WH3847> of [him that was] clothed הַבַּדִּ֑ים <WH906> with linen וַיִּקַּ֖ח <WH3947> who took וַיֵּצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> [it] and went out

וַיֵּרָ֖א <WH7200> And there appeared לַכְּרֻבִ֑ים <WH3742> in the cherubims תַּבְנִית֙ <WH8403> the form יַד־ <WH3027> hand אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of a man's תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under כַּנְפֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3671> under their wings

וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> And when I looked וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold אַרְבָּעָ֣ה <WH702> behold the four אוֹפַנִּים֮ <WH212> wheels אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> by הַכְּרוּבִים֒ <WH3742> the cherubims אוֹפַ֣ן <WH212> wheel אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> one אֵ֚צֶל <WH681> by הַכְּר֣וּב <WH3742> cherub אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one וְאוֹפַ֣ן <WH212> wheel אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> and another אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> by הַכְּר֣וּב <WH3742> cherub אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> another וּמַרְאֵה֙ <WH4758> and the appearance הָא֣וֹפַנִּ֔ים <WH212> of the wheels כְּעֵ֖ין <WH5869> [was] as the colour אֶ֥בֶן <WH68> stone תַּרְשִֽׁישׁ׃ <WH8658> of a beryl

וּמַ֨רְאֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4758> And [as for] their appearances דְּמ֥וּת <WH1823> likeness אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> had one לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֑ם <WH702> they four כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> if יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become הָאוֹפַ֖ן <WH212> as if a wheel בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> had been in the midst הָאוֹפָֽן׃ <WH212> of a wheel

בְּלֶכְתָּ֗ם <WH1980> moved אֶל־ <WH413> about אַרְבַּ֤עַת <WH702> upon their four רִבְעֵיהֶם֙ <WH7253> sides יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> went לֹ֥א <WH3808> without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <WH5437> they turned בְּלֶכְתָּ֑ם <WH1980> went כִּ֣י <WH3588> in הַמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> but to the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִפְנֶ֤ה <WH6437> looked הָרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> whither the head אַחֲרָ֣יו <WH310> as they יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> went לֹ֥א <WH3808> without יִסַּ֖בּוּ <WH5437> it they turned בְּלֶכְתָּֽם׃ <WH1980> moved

וְכָל־ <WH3605> their whole בְּשָׂרָם֙ <WH1320> And their whole body וְגַבֵּהֶ֔ם <WH1354> and their backs וִֽידֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> and their hands וְכַנְפֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3671> and their wings וְהָאֽוֹפַנִּ֗ים <WH212> and the wheels מְלֵאִ֤ים <WH4392> [were] full עֵינַ֙יִם֙ <WH5869> of eyes סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about לְאַרְבַּעְתָּ֖ם <WH702> that they four אוֹפַנֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH212> [even] the wheels
לָא֖וֹפַנִּ֑ים <WH212> As for the wheels לָהֶ֛ם קוֹרָ֥א <WH7121> it was cried הַגַּלְגַּ֖ל <WH1534> O wheel בְּאָזְנָֽי׃ <WH241> unto them in my hearing

וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> had four פָנִ֖ים <WH6440> faces לְאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> And every one פְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> face הָאֶחָ֜ד <WH259> the first פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> [was] the face הַכְּר֗וּב <WH3742> of a cherub וּפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> face הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <WH8145> and the second פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> [was] the face אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of a man וְהַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <WH7992> and the third פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the face אַרְיֵ֔ה <WH738> of a lion וְהָרְבִיעִ֖י <WH7243> and the fourth פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> the face נָֽשֶׁר׃ <WH5404> of an eagle

וַיֵּרֹ֖מּוּ <WH7426> were lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֑ים <WH3742> And the cherubims הִ֣יא <WH1931> he הַחַיָּ֔ה <WH2416> This [is] the living creature אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> that I saw בִּֽנְהַר־ <WH5104> by the river כְּבָֽר׃ <WH3529> of Chebar

וּבְלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> moved הַכְּרוּבִ֔ים <WH3742> And when the cherubims יֵלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> go הָאוֹפַנִּ֖ים <WH212> the wheels אֶצְלָ֑ם <WH681> by them וּבִשְׂאֵ֨ת <WH5375> lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֜ים <WH3742> and when the cherubims אֶת־ <WH853> כַּנְפֵיהֶ֗ם <WH3671> their wings לָרוּם֙ <WH7311> to mount up מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> from the earth לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִסַּ֧בּוּ <WH5437> turned הָאוֹפַנִּ֛ים <WH212> the same wheels גַּם־ <WH1571> again הֵ֖ם <WH1992> also מֵאֶצְלָֽם׃ <WH681> not from beside

בְּעָמְדָ֣ם <WH5975> When they stood יַעֲמֹ֔דוּ <WH5975> [these] stood וּבְרוֹמָ֖ם <WH7311> and when they were lifted up יֵר֣וֹמּוּ <WH7426> [these] lifted up אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> כִּ֛י <WH3588> for ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> themselves [also] for the spirit הַחַיָּ֖ה <WH2416> of the living creature בָּהֶֽם׃

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <WH3318> departed כְּב֣וֹד <WH3519> Then the glory יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> over מִפְתַּ֣ן <WH4670> from off the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> of the house וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> and stood עַל־ <WH5921> over הַכְּרוּבִֽים׃ <WH3742> over the cherubims

וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> lifted up הַכְּרוּבִ֣ים <WH3742> And the cherubims אֶת־ <WH853> כַּ֠נְפֵיהֶם <WH3671> their wings וַיֵּר֨וֹמּוּ <WH7426> and mounted up מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> from the earth לְעֵינַי֙ <WH5869> in my sight בְּצֵאתָ֔ם <WH3318> when they went out וְהָאֽוֹפַנִּ֖ים <WH212> the wheels לְעֻמָּתָ֑ם <WH5980> also [were] beside וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֗ד <WH5975> them and [every one] stood פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> at the door שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> gate בֵּית־ <WH1004> house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD'S הַקַּדְמוֹנִ֔י <WH6931> of the east וּכְב֧וֹד <WH3519> and the glory אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> [was] over them above

הִ֣יא <WH1931> These הַחַיָּ֗ה <WH2416> This [is] the living creature אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i רָאִ֛יתִי <WH7200> that I saw תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> beneath אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> under the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בִּֽנְהַר־ <WH5104> by the river כְּבָ֑ר <WH3529> of Chebar וָאֵדַ֕ע <WH3045> and I knew כִּ֥י <WH3588> that כְרוּבִ֖ים <WH3742> that they [were] the cherubims הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

אַרְבָּעָ֨ה <WH702> had four אַרְבָּעָ֤ה <WH702> four פָנִים֙ <WH6440> faces לְאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> Every one וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> had four כְּנָפַ֖יִם <WH3671> wings לְאֶחָ֑ד <WH259> apiece וּדְמוּת֙ <WH1823> and the likeness יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> of the hands אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of a man תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> and beneath כַּנְפֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3671> [was] under their wings

וּדְמ֣וּת <WH1823> And the likeness פְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> of their faces הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> [was] the same הַפָּנִ֗ים <WH6440> faces אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whose רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> which I saw עַל־ <WH5921> by נְהַר־ <WH5104> by the river כְּבָ֔ר <WH3529> of Chebar מַרְאֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4758> their appearances וְאוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶל־ <WH413> about עֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> straight פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> forward יֵלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> went
